query.statement:
INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZCST001 ( ADMCOST1, ADMCOST2, AMOUNT, APDAT, ASTAT, BGUBN, BIL_AMT, BILAMT1, BILAMT2, BILAMT3, BILDAT, BILDAT2, BILDAT3, BILEND, BSU, BUSSI, CHANGE, CHDAT, CHGBN, CHTIM, CRDAT, CRNAM, CRTIM, CS001_GBN, CST, CSTNM, DOC1, ERNAM, EXP_PCT, EXPENSE1, EXPENSE2, FAILYN, HIS_DIRSUM, HIS_INDSUM, HIS_LABOR, HIS_LCOST, HIS_LOG, HIS_OEM, HIS_INSPEC, HIS_ETC, HIS_RATE, HIS_TOTCOST, HIS_UCOST, ID_RATE, JOBEND, KUNNR, KVGR1, KVGR2, LCOST_OFR, LCOST_STD, LIFNR, MA_PSPID, MANDT, MNG_PCT, NETWR, NETWR_DC, NETWR_OFR, NETWR_STD, NIGHT_WGT, PERNR, PGBN, PNAME, PRDAT, PRO_PCT, PRTIM, PS_PSPID, QSTAT, QTDAT, QTNAM, QTNUM, QTNUM2, REMARK, REQKIND, REVENUE1, REVENUE2, RSTAT, RTEXT, SEQ, SH_ADDR, SH_TYP, SHDAT, SODAT, SPT, SUM_AMT, SUM_OFR, SUM_STD, SUR_RATE, SURCHARGE, TAXK1, UPN, VBELN, VBTYP, VKBUR, VKGRP, WAERS, WEEKEND_WGT, WERKS, ZTERM, MODGBN, AGENT, CYN, CTP, CSE, --//==================전현정대리요청 추가20181012==================// HIS_DLAB, HIS_BETC, HIS_MMOD, HIS_SAFE, HIS_LIFT, HIS_EMACID, --//===============================================================// ILSIC_YN -- 수리공사 일반 및 일식외주 구분값 추가. 2020.08.19 Han JH. 최선경 요청 ) VALUES ( SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #ADMCOST1# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #ADMCOST2# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #NETWR_OFR# AS DOUBLE)), '', 'Y', #BGUBN#, SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #BIL_AMT# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #BILAMT1# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #BILAMT2# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #BILAMT3# AS DOUBLE)), #BILDAT#, #BILDAT2#, #BILDAT3#, '', #BSU#, #BUSSI#, '', '', #CHGBN#, --변경구분:0 or '':미변겅 / 1:재청구 / 2:수주변경 / 3:수주취소 '', HEX(CURRENT DATE), #G_USER_ID#, HEX(CURRENT TIME), #CS001_GBN#, #CST#, #CSTNM#, #DOC1#, #G_USER_ID#, #EXP_PCT#, SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #EXPENSE1# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #EXPENSE2# AS DOUBLE)), #FAILYN#, SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #HIS_DIRSUM# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #HIS_INDSUM# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #HIS_LABOR# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #HIS_LCOST# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #HIS_LOG# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #HIS_OEM# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #HIS_INSPEC# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #HIS_ETC# AS DOUBLE)), #HIS_RATE#, SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #HIS_TOTCOST# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #HIS_UCOST# AS DOUBLE)), #ID_RATE#, '', #KUNNR#, #KVGR1#, #KVGR2#, SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #LCOST_OFR# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #LCOST_STD# AS DOUBLE)), #LIFNR#, #MA_PSPID#, #G_MANDT#, #MNG_PCT#, SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #NETWR_STD# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #NETWR_DC# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #NETWR_OFR# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #NETWR_STD# AS DOUBLE)), #NIGHT_WGT#, COALESCE((SELECT MAX(PERNR) FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT005 WHERE MANDT=#G_MANDT# AND LIFNR=SAPHEE.GET_LIFNR(#G_MANDT#, #LIFNR#)), ''), #PGBN#, #PNAME#, '', #PRO_PCT#, '', '', #QSTAT#, HEX(CURRENT DATE), #QTNAM#, #ds_key.QTNUM#, '', #REMARK#, #REQKIND#, SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #REVENUE1# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #REVENUE2# AS DOUBLE)), '', '', #ds_key.SEQ#, '', '', #SHDAT#, #SODAT#, #SPT#, SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #LCOST_OFR# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #SUM_OFR# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #SUM_STD# AS DOUBLE)), CAST( CAST(#ID_RATE# AS DOUBLE) / 100 AS DOUBLE), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( CAST(#SUM_OFR# AS DOUBLE) - CAST(#SUM_STD# AS DOUBLE) AS DOUBLE)), #TAXK1#, #UPN#, '', '', #VKBUR#, #VKGRP#, 'KRW', #WEEKEND_WGT#, #WERKS#, #ZTERM#, #MODGBN#, #AGENT#, #CYN#, #CTP#, #CSE#, --//==================전현정대리요청 추가20181012==================// SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #HIS_DLAB# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #HIS_BETC# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #HIS_MMOD# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #HIS_SAFE# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #HIS_LIFT# AS DOUBLE)), SAPHEE.SET_CURRDATA('KRW', CAST( #HIS_EMACID# AS DOUBLE)), --//===============================================================// CASE WHEN #ILSIC_YN# = '1' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END
)
